post:
Hello Dear LET customers, 

This year we will test a different Black Friday and i hope this will be better for all . During this week we will post here in this thread our offers  step by step (post 5 offers and after all is delivered step to the next offers) until all stock will be exhausted. We have decide this model because every year we have tard more than we have promise in delivery time and this year we want to be in time. 

To mention this : once a offer is exhausted or expired  we will not repeat it during this week so if you need storage for example you must to buy until have stoc because we will not put more in stoc. We will deliver all orders in maximum 3 hours after a clear payment. Also all cupon codes is recurring for life. The old customers know we never raiced the price .

Here we go with the first 4 offers  (most of them is well know in LET ) : 

<br />OFFER 1


<br />1gb ram
<br />1 core
<br />10 GB HDD
<br />1 ipv4 included
<br />1gbps port speed (SHARED !)
<br />10tb/mo traffic included

**Price 9.99 eur(12 dollars)/year**

Link to buy : https://secure.hostsolutions.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=296

Only 250 vps 
---------------------------------------------------------------

<br />OFFER2


<br />CPU: 2 Core
<br />RAM: 2 Gb ECC
<br />Hdd: 30 Gb 
<br />Ip address : 1 included
<br />Port: 1 Gbps 
<br />30tb/mo traffic included

price 1.99 eur/mo , using the cupon code "X4QV9LNH3C" if you pay yearly you will have 30% disccount more (**final price 16.72 eur/year**)

Link to buy ; https://secure.hostsolutions.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=124

Only 350 vps with this cupon code
-----------------------------------------------------------------

<br />OFFER3


<br />4 core
<br />4 gb ram
<br />400 gb hdd raid 10
<br />1gbps port speed
<br />1ipv4
<br />10tb/mo traffic


Price 6.5 eur/mo (38 eur yearly) , using the cupon code "FRE85XOP86" if you pay yearly you will have 30% disccount more (**final price 26.60 EUR/year**)

Link to buy : https://secure.hostsolutions.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=282

only 250 vps with this cupon code
---------------------------------------------------------------------

<br />Offer 4 (storage offer )



**Using the cupon code "BF2018STORAGEVPS"  **in any storage plan 1-2-4-6-8-10 tb** vps the price will be 30% off (you must to pay for 3 month minimum)

link to see full config and buy https://hostsolutions.ro/eng/hosting/cheap-storage-vps

in total 2000 cupons code aviable for all storage configs**


If you have any question feel free to ask here.

Thanks all and happy BF !
